now when we open the cloudnestra.com url we get nelow JS based url

function loadIframe(data = 1){
        if(data == 1){
            $("#the_frame").removeAttr("style");
            $("#the_frame").html("");
            $('<iframe>', {
               id: 'player_iframe',
               src: '--',
               frameborder: 0,
               scrolling: 'no',
               allowfullscreen: 'yes',
               allow: "autoplay",
               style: 'height: 100%; width: 100%;'
            }).appendTo('#the_frame');
            $("#player_iframe").on("load", function () {
                $("#the_frame").attr("style","background-image: none;");
            });
        }
    }
